question:
Which among the following is/are features of Negroids?
  1. Their eyes are dark brown in colour.
  2. Hairs are wooly, curly & frizzly.
  3. Their heights are found tall to very short.
Select the correct code from the options given below:
explanation:
The word Negro is derived from a latin word known as Nigor which means Black. The main habitat of Negroids is Africa continent and their main habitat is S.Africa that is why this place is also known as Black Africa.Â 
Features of Negroids:-
Skin, eyes and hairs are black in colour
Hairs are wooly, curly & frizzly.
Their Heights are found tall to very short.
